summary: Tired of corrupted saves and losing your Skyrim progress because all your autosaves and quick saves are taken couple minutes ago? SkyrimSaver is a program that makes backups from your saves automatically.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Blue][size=5]INTRO[/size][/color]

I got inspired to make this program when I couldn't start a quest since a mod (I'm using approx 150 mods) corrupted my save file. All my save files were corrupted too (automatic ones and quick). The last working save (before the mod broke the save) that I found, was made 4 hrs ago. After losing 4hrs of progress, I decided to code this lil helper.

[color=Blue][size=5]BASICS[/size][/color]

SkyrimSaver is a program that makes backups from save files automatically and archives(ZIP) them. So when you find out that your game save is broken, you can get that progress back! It is universal, you can basically use it on any files that you want to back up when changes are made to them (it only makes a backup if the file has been modified). SkyrimSaver lets you to decide when the files are getting archived and intervals. After setting up your settings, just click "Start Saving" -button, minimize it and start your game!. Skyrim Saver will work in the background.

It's coded in Java, so you need Java :) I made this program to myself, but decided to release it, maybe someone needs it.


[color=Blue][size=5]About SkyrimSaver, READ[/size][/color][size=5]
[/size]
YOU NEED JAVA!
The auto downloader is kind of buggy, so download it manually: [url=https://www.java.com/en/download/]HERE![/url]
When using to backup skyrim saves, remember to backup both files .ess and skse!

If you find any bugs, please inform me!

[size=5]
[color=Blue]About Me[/color]
[/size]
I'm fairly new in modding and this community.
My mother language isn't English, so bare with me :)
